strings:
<se_low>Kalderasha: Ah, delicious!
It tastes better today than ever... Hm?

<se_low>Kalderasha: Oh! What a surprise!
I have not seen your faces for a while!
Thank you again for what you did.

<se_low>Kalderasha: Who are you? ...Oh!
You're one of <hero>'s friends!?

<se_low>Kalderasha: Why such a glum face, anyway?
Is there something on your mind?

<se_low>Kalderasha: Wait, wait! You do not need to tell everyone!
The great Kalderasha knows all there is
to know!
<se_low>Kalderasha: Come to my house and I will use my fortune-telling to banish your worries!
